Intervention: • An active medicine to compare with a placebo
Eligibility: Learn more Age of consent: 18-85 years Weight: 50-100 kg Neutrophils / Lymphocytes ratio >4 and/or "negative triple" histological state and/or positive lymph nodes

* Previous cancer (percentage of basal cell skin cancer and cervical cancer in situ) Nonconformity or refusal of protocol Positive pregnancy test Mothers of childbearing or breast-feeding age Contraindication of NSAID intake within 5 days prior to randomization NSAID intended use within 30 days following randomization Non curative surgery (T4 or M1 tumour classification)
Results: 2 years for primary analysis + 3 additional years for secondary analysis (From date of randomization to date of first documented progression or date of death of any cause, whichever occurs first, estimated up to 5 years)
Description of the arm/group: active medicine to compare with placebo
Type of measure: Number of participants
Description of the arm/group: Ketorolac 30 mg IV
Type of measure: Number of participants
Adverse Events: Any type (not related to bleeding) 7/107 (6.54 per cent)
